properties.name: name
properties.label: Name
properties.tooltip: Plugin configuration name

validators.name: required
validators.message: Name field should not be empty

validators.name: uniqueTableKey
validators.message: Name contains duplicated values

properties.name: pluginVersion
properties.label: Plugin version
properties.tooltip: Required plugin version

properties.name: label
properties.label: Label
properties.tooltip: Plugin configuration extended label and description

properties.name: catalogName
properties.label: Catalog name
properties.tooltip: Catalog name

validators.name: requiredSelection
validators.message: Catalog name should have at least one value selected

properties.name: eventCondition
properties.label: Event condition
properties.tooltip: Condition an event must match to trigger this configuration. Expressed in Groovy

properties.name: maxWorkSize
properties.label: Maximum work size
properties.tooltip: Maximum number of items the plugin can process before delegating to other nodes

properties.name: eventClass
properties.label: Event class
properties.tooltip: Event Class name to trigger current plugin configuration

properties.name: nodeCondition
properties.label: Node condition
properties.tooltip: Condition an node must match to be able to run this configuration. Expressed in Groovy

properties.name: autoStart
properties.label: Auto start
properties.tooltip: Option to enable/disable the automatic execution of the plugin configuration after node startup

properties.name: clouderaNavigatorApiVersion
properties.label: Cloudera Navigator API Version
properties.tooltip: API Version of Cloudera Navigator

validators.name: required
validators.message: Cloudera Navigator API Version field should not be empty

properties.name: clouderaNavigatorHost
properties.label: Cloudera Navigator Host
properties.tooltip: Host name or IP address where Cloudera Navigator is installed

validators.name: required
validators.message: Cloudera Navigator Host field should not be empty

properties.name: clouderaNavigatorPort
properties.label: Cloudera Navigator Port
properties.tooltip: Port number using which Cloudera Navigator can be accessed

validators.name: required
validators.message: Cloudera Navigator Port field should not be empty

properties.name: clouderaNavigatorUser
properties.label: Cloudera Navigator Username
properties.tooltip: Cloudera Navigator Username

validators.name: required
validators.message: Cloudera Navigator Username field should not be empty

properties.name: clouderaNavigatorPassword
properties.label: Cloudera Navigator Password
properties.tooltip: Cloudera Navigator Password

validators.name: required
validators.message: label field should not be empty

properties.name: sourceTypes
properties.label: Source Types
properties.tooltip: Source types supported by Cloudera Navigator Cataloger

value.name: includeTopNamePattern
value.label: Top Level Include Name
value.tooltip: Specify only the matching names of Databases, Directories, and Operations

value.name: includeNamePattern
value.label: Include Name
value.tooltip: Specify only the matching names of Tables, Files, and SubOperations

properties.name: includeNameWrapper
properties.label: Include items
properties.tooltip: Includes items for scanning. Supports the usage of * to filter items.

value.name: excludeTopNamePattern
value.label: Top Level Exclude Name
value.tooltip: Specify only the matching names of Databases, Directories, and Operations

value.name: excludeNamePattern
value.label: Exclude Name
value.tooltip: Specify only the matching names of Tables, Files, and SubOperations

properties.name: excludeNameWrapper
properties.label: Exclude items
properties.tooltip: Excludes items for scanning. Supports the usage of * to filter items.

properties.name: fromLastRun
properties.label: Incremental from last run
properties.tooltip: Use the slider to enable or disable the scan activity for the updated records after the last run. Date/time based filters are ignored.

value.name: fromDate
value.label: From
value.tooltip: Specify the FROM date, an empty entry is considered as an infinite date

value.name: toDate
value.label: To
value.tooltip: Specify the TO date, an empty entry is considered as the current date

properties.name: dateTimeFilters
properties.label: Creation/Execution Date
properties.tooltip: Date based filter to scan entities such as directories, files, tables, and operation executions

validators.name: required
validators.message: label field should not be empty

properties.name: sourceTypes
properties.label: Source Types
properties.tooltip: Source types supported by Cloudera Navigator Cataloger

value.name: includeTopNamePattern
value.label: Top Level Include Name
value.tooltip: Specify only the matching names of Databases, Directories, and Operations

value.name: includeNamePattern
value.label: Include Name
value.tooltip: Specify only the matching names of Tables, Files, and SubOperations

properties.name: includeNameWrapper
properties.label: Include items
properties.tooltip: Includes items for scanning. Supports the usage of * to filter items.

value.name: excludeTopNamePattern
value.label: Top Level Exclude Name
value.tooltip: Specify only the matching names of Databases, Directories, and Operations

value.name: excludeNamePattern
value.label: Exclude Name
value.tooltip: Specify only the matching names of Tables, Files, and SubOperations

properties.name: excludeNameWrapper
properties.label: Exclude items
properties.tooltip: Excludes items for scanning. Supports the usage of * to filter items.

properties.name: fromLastRun
properties.label: Incremental from last run
properties.tooltip: Use the slider to enable or disable the scan activity for the updated records after the last run. Date/time based filters are ignored.

value.name: fromDate
value.label: From
value.tooltip: Specify the FROM date, an empty entry is considered as an infinite date

value.name: toDate
value.label: To
value.tooltip: Specify the TO date, an empty entry is considered as the current date

properties.name: dateTimeFilters
properties.label: Creation/Execution Date
properties.tooltip: Date based filter to scan entities such as directories, files, tables, and operation executions

properties.name: trackRelations
properties.label: Scan Relations
properties.tooltip: Use the slider to enable or disable the scan activity for the related operations on the source types. Enable the slider to show the lineage information of the related operations.

properties.name: skipSelects
properties.label: Skip Select Queries
properties.tooltip: Use the slider to enable or disable the scan activity for the SELECT queries. Enable the slider to improve the performance.

description: Retrieves metadata and lineage information from Cloudera Navigator API

validators.script: pluginConfig.filter.filters.collect{ it.others.dateTimeFilters }.findAll{ it.fromDate && it.toDate && it.fromDate > it.toDate }.isEmpty()

message: Entity creation start date cannot be set after end date

properties.tooltip: Condition an node must match to be able to run this configuration. Expressed in Groovy

properties.name: autoStart
properties.label: Auto start
properties.tooltip: Option to enable/disable the automatic execution of the plugin configuration after node startup

properties.name: clouderaNavigatorApiVersion
properties.label: Cloudera Navigator API Version
properties.tooltip: API Version of Cloudera Navigator

validators.name: required
validators.message: Cloudera Navigator API Version field should not be empty

properties.name: clouderaNavigatorHost
properties.label: Cloudera Navigator Host
properties.tooltip: Host name or IP address where Cloudera Navigator is installed

validators.name: required
validators.message: Cloudera Navigator Host field should not be empty

properties.name: clouderaNavigatorPort
properties.label: Cloudera Navigator Port
properties.tooltip: Port number using which Cloudera Navigator can be accessed

validators.name: required
validators.message: Cloudera Navigator Port field should not be empty

properties.name: clouderaNavigatorUser
properties.label: Cloudera Navigator Username
properties.tooltip: Cloudera Navigator Username

validators.name: required
validators.message: Cloudera Navigator Username field should not be empty

properties.name: clouderaNavigatorPassword
properties.label: Cloudera Navigator Password
properties.tooltip: Cloudera Navigator Password

validators.name: required
validators.message: label field should not be empty

properties.name: sourceTypes
properties.label: Source Types
properties.tooltip: Source types supported by Cloudera Navigator Cataloger

value.name: includeTopNamePattern
value.label: Top Level Include Name
value.tooltip: Specify only the matching names of Databases, Directories, and Operations

value.name: includeNamePattern
value.label: Include Name
value.tooltip: Specify only the matching names of Tables, Files, and SubOperations

properties.name: includeNameWrapper
properties.label: Include items
properties.tooltip: Includes items for scanning. Supports the usage of * to filter items.

value.name: excludeTopNamePattern
value.label: Top Level Exclude Name
value.tooltip: Specify only the matching names of Databases, Directories, and Operations

value.name: excludeNamePattern
value.label: Exclude Name
value.tooltip: Specify only the matching names of Tables, Files, and SubOperations

properties.name: excludeNameWrapper
properties.label: Exclude items
properties.tooltip: Excludes items for scanning. Supports the usage of * to filter items.

properties.name: fromLastRun
properties.label: Incremental from last run
properties.tooltip: Use the slider to enable or disable the scan activity for the updated records after the last run. Date/time based filters are ignored.

value.name: fromDate
value.label: From
value.tooltip: Specify the FROM date, an empty entry is considered as an infinite date

value.name: toDate
value.label: To
value.tooltip: Specify the TO date, an empty entry is considered as the current date

properties.name: dateTimeFilters
properties.label: Creation/Execution Date
properties.tooltip: Date based filter to scan entities such as directories, files, tables, and operation executions

validators.name: required
validators.message: label field should not be empty

properties.name: sourceTypes
properties.label: Source Types
properties.tooltip: Source types supported by Cloudera Navigator Cataloger

value.name: includeTopNamePattern
value.label: Top Level Include Name
value.tooltip: Specify only the matching names of Databases, Directories, and Operations

value.name: includeNamePattern
value.label: Include Name
value.tooltip: Specify only the matching names of Tables, Files, and SubOperations

properties.name: includeNameWrapper
properties.label: Include items
properties.tooltip: Includes items for scanning. Supports the usage of * to filter items.

value.name: excludeTopNamePattern
value.label: Top Level Exclude Name
value.tooltip: Specify only the matching names of Databases, Directories, and Operations

value.name: excludeNamePattern
value.label: Exclude Name
value.tooltip: Specify only the matching names of Tables, Files, and SubOperations

properties.name: excludeNameWrapper
properties.label: Exclude items
properties.tooltip: Excludes items for scanning. Supports the usage of * to filter items.

properties.name: fromLastRun
properties.label: Incremental from last run
properties.tooltip: Use the slider to enable or disable the scan activity for the updated records after the last run. Date/time based filters are ignored.

value.name: fromDate
value.label: From
value.tooltip: Specify the FROM date, an empty entry is considered as an infinite date

value.name: toDate
value.label: To
value.tooltip: Specify the TO date, an empty entry is considered as the current date

properties.name: dateTimeFilters
properties.label: Creation/Execution Date
properties.tooltip: Date based filter to scan entities such as directories, files, tables, and operation executions

properties.name: trackRelations
properties.label: Scan Relations
properties.tooltip: Use the slider to enable or disable the scan activity for the related operations on the source types. Enable the slider to show the lineage information of the related operations.

properties.name: skipSelects
properties.label: Skip Select Queries
properties.tooltip: Use the slider to enable or disable the scan activity for the SELECT queries. Enable the slider to improve the performance.

description: Retrieves metadata and lineage information from Cloudera Navigator API

validators.script: pluginConfig.filter.filters.collect{ it.others.dateTimeFilters }.findAll{ it.fromDate && it.toDate && it.fromDate > it.toDate }.isEmpty()

message: Entity creation start date cannot be set after end date

properties.name: name
properties.label: Name
properties.tooltip: Plugin configuration name

validators.name: required
validators.message: Name field should not be empty

validators.name: uniqueTableKey
validators.message: Name contains duplicated values

properties.name: pluginVersion
properties.label: Plugin version
properties.tooltip: Required plugin version

properties.name: label
properties.label: Label
properties.tooltip: Plugin configuration extended label and description

properties.name: catalogName
properties.label: Catalog name
properties.tooltip: Catalog name

validators.name: requiredSelection
validators.message: Catalog name should have at least one value selected

properties.name: eventCondition
properties.label: Event condition
properties.tooltip: Condition an event must match to trigger this configuration. Expressed in Groovy

properties.name: maxWorkSize
properties.label: Maximum work size
properties.tooltip: Maximum number of items the plugin can process before delegating to other nodes

properties.name: eventClass
properties.label: Event class
properties.tooltip: Event Class name to trigger current plugin configuration

properties.tooltip: Condition an node must match to be able to run this configuration. Expressed in Groovy
